sourcing.instructions: - Barium Carbonate: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
steps: - Barium Carbonate: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
1. Weigh all materials accurately using an analytical balance.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh all materials accurately using an analytical balance.

steps: 1. Transfer the paste into a ceramic mold with dimensions 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the paste into a ceramic mold with dimensions 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature.

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
